QuestData.Title: Forge Camp: Annihilated
QuestData.Description: Gather your courage, $n. You will need it if you are to face an overseer.$B$BOnce you are ready, find and kill the overseers at each camp. Take their keys and use them to turn and fire the fel cannons upon the camps. Return to me once the camps are destroyed.
QuestData.LogDescription: Altruis the Sufferer in western Nagrand has asked that you Destroy Forge Camp: Hate and Destroy Forge Camp: Fear.
QuestData.RewardText: We are victorious! The Legion's advances have been halted!$B$BI offer you a choice of rewards for your heroic deeds!
